channel.title: First 20 Completionist win $5 Each! - EpicPks
channel.description:
[center]DOWNLOAD HERE
[url=http://www.epicurus-pk.com]www.epicurus-pk.com[/url] [url=http://www.epicpks.com]www.epicpks.com[/url]
[size=18pt]EpicPks - Formerly Epicurus[/size]
[IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/bfqmp1.png[/img]
EpicPks is back! May I present to you, our new expansion to this re-established community, EpicPks. The time has come where EpicPks must rise from it's grave and provide you, our beloved player base, an all round enjoyable and efficient server and community. With a dedicated staff team here to provide constant help and updates, you can rest assured that you will not regret joining us! Our server is simple; it focuses on all the great aspects of RuneScape without the tedious tasks that the real game makes you do. Feel like taking on some deadly bosses for epic loot? Take a loot at the PvM side of the server. Want to fight other players to the death with pleasing rewards? Jump right into the active PvP our server offers. Simply want to show off your hard work and dedication to skilling? All skills are working perfectly!
First 20 Players to get maxed will receive 5$!
So the challenge rises, the skills are levelling up, and you must train your way through the other player who wants to accomplish this goal. You must start from the bottom - level 3. __________________________________________________ ____________________ Duo slayer Amazing donator benefits/shops Blast furnace minigame Working money pouch FIGHT PITS Flawless Lottery Flawless Dicing Flawless Duel Arena & Staking Flawless Shopping System Flawless Banking Perfect Farming System Rank Icon Changing System Flawless Loyalty/donator Titles Flawless Donator System (To be implemented) Perfect Curse System Flawless Hybridding Weapon Combination Staking Boss Fights with Perfect Drops Combat Stat Resets Perfect Slayer System Random PvP Rewards Working Clue Scrolls & Rewards Working Minigames & Rewards Perfect Combat System & PvP weapons Custom Capes (To be implemented)
P.S Completionist competitors must use accounts created on or after the 8th of November 2014 if they intend to claim a prize.
DOWNLOAD LINKS BELOW:
[url=http://www.epicurus-pk.com]www.epicurus-pk.com[/url] [url=http://www.epicpks.com]www.epicpks.com[/url]
Make sure you have correct java. That unblock nd client doesn't work. Go to www.java.com and verify your java, my guess you have older java it requires Java ([size=12pt]Version 8 Update 25[/size]).
[url=http://java.com/en/download/installed8.jsp]http://java.com/en/download/installed8.jsp[/url]
There is a link for you. [/center]
